title: Part Three: Helena Blavatsky: the woman who inspired the Nazis, and Gwyneth Paltrow
itunes:title: Part Three: Helena Blavatsky: the woman who inspired the Nazis, and Gwyneth Paltrow
description:
Robert and Jamie Loftus talk about Helena Blavatsky's time in the United States, inventing the "new age" movement.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
